#summary Game Modes Help

== Single Player ==

This mode starts a 2 player game with one player controlled by the computer. Your hand is shown at the bottom of the screen and the back of the computer's hand is shown at the top of the screen. 


== Multi-player ==

This mode allows you to pick the number of players (from 2-4), all controlled by human players on a single device. The number of cards in each player's hand is shown in the top right corner.
